Text.Name: Item_Boss_Jiaowangci
Text.ThingName: Wyrm King Horn

Text.Name: Item_Boss_Fenghuangneidan
Text.ThingName: ฟินิกซ์ Core

Text.Name: Item_Boss_Fenghuanghuoyu
Text.ThingName: ฟินิกซ์ Flame Feather

Text.Name: Item_BossFeng_HuoYu
Text.ThingName: Blazing Feather
Text.Desc: A peculiar feather, although it is not very hot to the touch, it can keep diffusing heat indefinitely, significantly increasing the temperature of a room or other confined space. It doesn't seem to have much use except for its strong spirit converging effect.

Text.Name: Item_BossFeng_GangYu
Text.ThingName: ฟินิกซ์ Ironclad Feather
Text.Desc: An intact ฟินิกซ์ feather, its immense heat entirely confined within. It is sharp and sturdy. Wearing it enables one to become impervious to cold, speeding up the circulation of พลังชี่ and blood as well as boosting food consumption rate.

Text.Name: Item_BossFeng_TouYu
Text.ThingName: ฟินิกซ์ Oblivion Feather
Text.Desc: The gorgeous feather in eternal flames from ฟินิกซ์'s head, containing its concentrated essence. ฟินิกซ์ is skilled in the ways of spells. Wearing it allows one to harness the power of ฟินิกซ์ and break through the skill limit of Spell by 3 levels.

Text.Name: Item_BossFeng_WeiYu
Text.ThingName: ฟินิกซ์ Mantle Feather
Text.Desc: ฟินิกซ์'s huge tail feather. Despite the glowing flame dwelling atop it, one feels moderately warm rather than burning hot upon touching it, which is quite marvelous. It should have some peculiar effects after having been processed with a special method.

Text.Name: Item_BossFeng_Gu
Text.ThingName: ฟินิกซ์ Iron Bone
Text.Desc: The hollow bones of ฟินิกซ์'s two wings, they are unusually firm and weightless. It should have some peculiar effects after having been processed with a special method.

Text.Name: Item_BossFeng_HongYu
Text.ThingName: ฟินิกซ์ Fire Jade
Text.Desc: ฟินิกซ์'s source of power; this is where its วิญญาณบรรพกาล resides. If one communicate with its วิญญาณบรรพกาล, one might be able to comprehend some useful information from it. Wearing it allows one to harness ฟินิกซ์'s power and take 10% less Fire damage.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Meditate
Text.StoryBnts.0.Desc: Attempt to obtain some useful information from it.

Text.Name: Item_BossFeng_Meat
Text.ThingName: ฟินิกซ์ Flesh
Text.Desc: The finest flesh and blood of ฟินิกซ์'s body, consuming it increase one's ค่าพลังชี่สูงสุด by 25, and extend Lifespan for 10 years. Multiple consumptions will gradually diminish its effect.

Text.Name: Item_DragonScale
Text.ThingName: Dragon Scale
Text.Desc: Scale fallen from dragon's body, it has lost most of its magical qualities except for a strong spirit converging effect.

Text.Name: Item_BossLong_Jiao
Text.ThingName: มังกรหลาก Horn
Text.Desc: The horn on top of มังกรหลาก's head, it is where the dragon's essence is concentrated. มังกรหลาก is skilled in the ways of Artifact Mastery. Wearing it allows one to harness the power of มังกรหลาก and break through the skill limit of Sword Mastery by 3 levels.

Text.Name: Item_BossLong_Zhua
Text.ThingName: มังกรหลาก Devil Claw
Text.Desc: Sharp claw from มังกรหลาก, it has no shortage of sharpened edges and possess unstoppable destructive power. It should have some peculiar effects after having been processed with a special method.

Text.Name: Item_BossLong_Lin
Text.ThingName: มังกรหลาก Scale
Text.Desc: An intact scale from the body of มังกรหลาก, it is quite indestructible. Wearing it enables one to resist พลังชี่ Damage.

Text.Name: Item_BossLong_NiLin
Text.ThingName: มังกรหลาก Forbidden Scale
Text.Desc: The source of มังกรหลาก's power, this is where its วิญญาณบรรพกาล resides. If one communicate with its วิญญาณบรรพกาล, one might be able to comprehend some useful information from it. Wearing it allows one to harness the power of มังกรหลาก, and take 10% less Water damage.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Meditate
Text.StoryBnts.0.Desc: Attempt to obtain some useful information from it.

Text.Name: Item_BossLong_Jing
Text.ThingName: มังกรหลาก Wrath Vein
Text.Desc: The toughest tendon-เส้นพลังชี่ in มังกรหลาก's tail, it is of excellent พลังชี่ conductivity. It should have some peculiar effects after having been processed with a special method.

Text.Name: Item_BossLong_Meat
Text.ThingName: มังกรหลาก Flesh
Text.Desc: The finest flesh and blood of มังกรหลาก's body, consuming it increase one's ค่าพลังชี่สูงสุด by 25, and extend Lifespan for 10 years. Multiple consumptions will gradually diminish its effect.

Text.Name: Item_BossZhuLong_BaiLin
Text.ThingName: White Scale
Text.Desc: Pure white scale shed from มังกรประทีป's body.

Text.Name: Item_BossZhuLong_HeiLin
Text.ThingName: Black Scale
Text.Desc: Pitch black scale shed from มังกรประทีป's body.

Text.Name: Item_BossZhuLong_Eye
Text.ThingName: Yin-Yang Crystal
Text.Desc: Transparent crystals of the mixed black and white colors in มังกรประทีป's eyes, through which one can seemingly decipher the mysteries of the ways of yin and yang. It should have some peculiar effects after having been processed with a special method.

Text.Name: Item_BossZhuLong_TianLin
Text.ThingName: Divine มังกรประทีป Scale
Text.Desc: The odd shaped scale in between the มังกรประทีป's eyebrows, it is where the dragon's essence is concentrated. Five Elements which have been transformed by มังกรประทีป from Yin and Yang. Wearing it allows one to harness the power of มังกรประทีป and break through the skill limit of Barrier by 3 levels.

Text.Name: Item_BossZhuLong_LongYu
Text.ThingName: Chaos Jade
Text.Desc: มังกรประทีป's source of power, this is where a wisp of its remaining วิญญาณบรรพกาล resides. If one communicate with its วิญญาณบรรพกาล, one might be able to comprehend some useful information from it. Wearing it allows one to harness the power of มังกรประทีป, and take 5% less elemental damage.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Meditate
Text.StoryBnts.0.Desc: Attempt to obtain some useful information from it.

Text.Name: Item_BossZhuLong_Meat
Text.ThingName: Primeval Flesh
Text.Desc: Blood and flesh from มังกรประทีป's body, it is tainted by the power of Yin and Yang and thus has unique uses. Consuming it decreases ค่าความสำเร็จ by 2 and extends Lifespan by 10 years. Multiple consumptions will gradually diminish its effect.

Text.Name: Item_BossFeng_FengYin
Text.ThingName: ฟินิกซ์ Jade
Text.Desc: An ancient piece of jade from the treasures of the dragon's platform, it seems to be one of a set of items.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Inspect
Text.StoryBnts.0.Desc: Inspect the ฟินิกซ์ Jade.

Text.Name: Item_BossZhuLong_FengYin
Text.ThingName: Ancient Jade
Text.Desc: A peculiar piece of jade found on the Heavenly Battlefield, the ancient battlefield. The essence of Yin and Yang flickers within it, as if nurturing something.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Inspect
